summary.para: Contains flags that describe the characteristics of a clock. These flags are returned by the method.

The clock times returned by the method are in units of 100 nanoseconds. If this flag is absent, call to get the clock frequency. The clock frequency is given in the qwClockFrequency member of the structure returned by that method.
The clock is always running. If this flag is present, the clock cannot be paused or stopped. If this flag is absent, call the method to get the current state.
The clock times are generated from the system clock.
